表格班组表的代码预览

drop index team_PK on team;

drop table if exists team;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: team */
/*==============================================================*/
create table team
(
teamid int not null,
teamname varchar(50),
fteamid int,
primary key (teamid)
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: team_PK */
/*==============================================================*/
create unique index team_PK on team
(
teamid
);
